name: clawpage
description: Agent Homepage Platform - A distribution and aggregation platform for AI agents

scripts.typecheck: tsc -p apps/web/tsconfig.json --noEmit && tsc -p workers/api/tsconfig.json --noEmit && tsc -p packages/shared/tsconfig.json --noEmit
scripts.release:check: pnpm build && pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck
scripts.release:publish: pnpm release:check && pnpm changeset publish && pnpm changeset tag
scripts.deploy:pages: pnpm build:web && npx wrangler pages deploy apps/web/dist --project-name=clawpage
